title: Practice Challenge
description: Create a todo list with: 1. At least 5 todos 2. Use ListView.builder 3. Each todo has a checkbox icon 4. Bonus: Add dividers ---
instructions: Create a todo list with: 1. At least 5 todos 2. Use ListView.builder 3. Each todo has a checkbox icon 4. Bonus: Add dividers ---

testCases.expectedOutput: ListView.builder creates items dynamically with itemCount: 6
Icons.check_box for completed, Icons.check_box_outline_blank for pending
Divider widget rendered between each ListTile

hints.text: Use ListView.builder with itemCount and itemBuilder parameters
ListTile has leading (icon), title (text) properties - perfect for todo items

commonMistakes.mistake: Not returning a widget from itemBuilder
commonMistakes.correction: Use exact case: main not Main, print not Print
